name: Mental Health Journal - Notion Template
description: Welcome to our Mental Health Journal - Notion Template!Mental Health Journaling is a great way to stay on top of your mental health and understand yourself more deeply! We designed this template so that you can have an organized space to journal about different mental health elements from finding gratitude, forgiveness, joy, and more!We also included a wellness toolkit in our premium version so that you can gather mental health resources, store your positive affirmations, and collect inspiring q
